name: C.H.R.I.S Cards
description:
A card game based of C.H.R.I.S!

What does that mean? Cool, Hummus, Rights, Imaginary, Suspects.

This game is still in development, and I really want to see it go far. In the game, you can click the website button, and if you're smart enough to add 2 to 3, you probably know what that'll do.

There aren't much visual animations, so keeping the audio is recommended.
